basics.name: Diijon Taylor
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Professional Web Developer, Programmer, Database Analyst, and Graphic Designer that specializes in blending powerful web solutions and data exchange with quality layout and design. I have more than ten years of experience working with web technologies.

work.summary: City Corridor develops and maintains a secure distributed sales and advertising platform
highlights: Built a multi-tenant custom content management system
Built a ETL solution that imports data from multiple partners and data sources into a centralized database

Technologies & Skills: Web Development with ASP.Net MVC, REST and SOAP WebServices, NodeJS, AngularJS, KnockoutJS, jQuery, CSS, Entity Framework, Windows Azure, OAUth 2.0, Microsoft SQL Server, RavenDB, MongoDB, MixPanel, Octopus Deploy, JetBrains TeamCity and YouTrack, Github

work.summary: Unisys Federal Systems develops software applications to assist government agencies in data-mining, budget analysis, inventory tracking, and document management
highlights: Developed budgeting solution for managing $1 billion+ assets

Technologies & Skills: Web Development with ASP.Net Webforms and MVC, SOAP WebServices, NHibernate, EntityFramework, jQuery, CSS, Microsoft SQL Server, SSIS, Crystal Reports, Microsoft Visual SourceSafe

work.summary: Tidewater Finance Company provides assistance to consumers purchasing goods by building direct relationships with retail and automobile merchants
highlights: Rebranding of online presence for 3 websites, providing self-service account tools for 50,000+ accounts
Developed the online presence for a retirement community website featuring a custom XML-based content management system
Technologies & Skills: Web Development with ASP.Net Webforms, SOAP WebServices, jQuery, CSS, Microsoft SQL Server, SSIS, Graphic Design

work.summary: The City of Virginia Beach ComIT department is responsible for delivering technology solutions to all City of Virginia Beach departments and citizens
highlights: Developed XML-based Adobe Flash training tools and games featuring custom XML-based content management systems
Lead redesign of several high-traffic websites and assisted team members in web development
Technologies & Skills: Web Development with ASP.Net Webforms, SOAP WebServices, JavaScript, CSS, Microsoft SQL Server, Graphic Design
